function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of attention to green spaces and communal areas","Impact":"Reduced community immunity and increased risk of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increased focus on green space design and accessibility, promoting community-level infrastructure planning","Technologies":"Green park design, community-level infrastructure planning","People":"Community members, urban planners, architects","Owner":"Urban planners, architects"},{"Description":"Ineffective building systems and air distribution patterns","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality leading to increased risk of airborne contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Integration of non-centralized building systems, use of air purifiers and air quality monitoring systems","Technologies":"Integrated non-centralized building systems, air purifiers, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Building engineers, architects","Owner":"Building engineers, architects"},{"Description":"Reliance on industry suggestions over scholarly research","Impact":"Lack of evidence-based solutions for building system design and architectural engineering","Mitigation":"Increased investment in scholarly research, collaboration between industry and academia","Technologies":"Research methodologies, collaboration platforms","People":"Researchers, industry professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, industry organizations"}]}
